headline: Medtronic (MDT) and its Role in a Recession-Proof Portfolio
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) is included among the 10 Best Recession Proof Dividend Stocks to Buy. In a recession, economic activity slows, unemployment rises, and consumer spending drops. However, defensive sectors like healthcare often hold up better since medical products and services are essential. Companies such as Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) benefit from this resilience. headline: Bridge to Life Appoints David Castiglioni as Chief Commercial Officer to Head Global Commercial Operations and Lead the U.S. Commercialization of VitaSmart™
summary: Bridge to Life Ltd., a leader in organ preservation solutions and perfusion technology, today announced the appointment of David Castiglioni as Chief Commercial Officer (CCO). In this role, Mr. Castiglioni will be responsible for all global commercial operations, with an immediate focus on preparing for the U.S. launch of the VitaSmart™ Hypothermic Oxygenated Perfusion System upon FDA clearance. The United States represents the largest global market for machine perfusion technology.
